title: Remote soil moisture sensing
summary: Remotely measure soil moisture at depths of up to 200mm.

eligible.eligibleBullet01: remotely measure soil moisture at depths of up to 200mm
eligible.eligibleBullet02: have an accuracy of at least Â± 0.03m3/m3
eligible.eligibleBullet04: be easily inserted and removed from the soil
eligible.eligibleBullet05: have a remote communication system such as bluetooth to connect with a networked base station or mobile phone
eligible.eligibleText01: Subscriptions or software are not eligible.
